pkgmetadata.longdescription: # spfy-----**Table of Contents*** [Installation](#installation)* [License](#license)## Installationspfy is distributed on [PyPI](https://pypi.org) as a universalwheel and is available on Linux/macOS and Windows and supportsPython 3.6+ and PyPy.```bash$ pip install spfy```## Licensespfy is distributed under the terms of both- [MIT License](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/mit)- [Apache License, Version 2.0](https://choosealicense.com/licenses/apache-2.0)at your option.
